meanings.definition: A unit of digital information equivalent to 2^60 bytes.
meanings.sent1: I stored all my photos on several qubytes of memory.
meanings.sent2: The computer's hard drive had a capacity of several qubytes.
meanings.sent3: It's amazing how much data can fit into just a few qubytes!
meanings.sent4: Her mind was like a vast library, each memory a qubyte waiting to be accessed.
meanings.sent5: The server room was filled with the hum of qubytes working tirelessly.
